Sentencas: New concepts for a high performance catalyzed-reaction layer for medium temperature operating solid oxide fuel cells were proposed.
Titulo: HIGH-PERFORMANCE CATALYZED-REACTION LAYER FOR MEDIUM-TEMPERATURE OPERATING SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELLS

Sentencas: Mixed conducting oxide particles, samaria-doped ceria (SDC), were employed as the anode material utilizing highly dispersed noble metal catalysts on their surface.
Titulo: HIGH-PERFORMANCE CATALYZED-REACTION LAYER FOR MEDIUM-TEMPERATURE OPERATING SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELLS

Sentencas: As the cathode material, Sr-doped LaMnO3 (LSM) particles catalyzed with microcrystalline Pt were employed.
Titulo: HIGH-PERFORMANCE CATALYZED-REACTION LAYER FOR MEDIUM-TEMPERATURE OPERATING SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELLS

Sentencas: Performances of the anode or cathode were examined in the cell using yttria-stabilized zirconia electrolyte at a series of operating temperatures.
Titulo: HIGH-PERFORMANCE CATALYZED-REACTION LAYER FOR MEDIUM-TEMPERATURE OPERATING SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELLS

Sentencas: It was found that the anodic polarization resistance and its activation energy were greatly decreased by loading only a small amount of the catalysts (such as Ru, Rh, and Pt) onto the SDC particles.
Titulo: HIGH-PERFORMANCE CATALYZED-REACTION LAYER FOR MEDIUM-TEMPERATURE OPERATING SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELLS

Sentencas: The polarization loss at the anode showed a minimum value by using the SDC particles with a mean diameter of 1.5 to 2/0 mum.
Titulo: HIGH-PERFORMANCE CATALYZED-REACTION LAYER FOR MEDIUM-TEMPERATURE OPERATING SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELLS

Sentencas: A large depolarizing effect was also observed with a Pt-catalyzed LSM cathode, especially at high current densities.
Titulo: HIGH-PERFORMANCE CATALYZED-REACTION LAYER FOR MEDIUM-TEMPERATURE OPERATING SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELLS
